tips.summary: Generally I’d avoid this one but it’s good if you’re desperate for stats or if you want to build dragons with poet.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Pick this if you need to be stronger. You don’t have to force undead because of this trinket, can easily pivot lategame to some other comp or double down on undead.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Super strong, especially if you already have another Automaton or if playing a hero that can make good use of the card(akazamzarak/teron/LK). You will want to stay a bit more on tavern 4 and look for reborn/divine shield and then go 5 to get kangor’s and eyes of the earth mother to finish the build. Best Greater trinket follow-up is Chess Set!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Tricky trinket because it sounds great in theory but it’s a bit slow and if you miss your first discovery you might fall too behind to be able to recover. Can still be a good option on heroes that can make great use of six drops like Millhouse or Reno or when nothing better gets offered.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo trinket but I’m not the biggest fan of it’s late-game utility.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: I never pick this one, it’s so hard to make it work well that I don’t want to bother.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Could be a good pick just to clean your tavern but generally really good when playing demons or murlocs since you benefit a lot from seeing high tier minions and avoiding the small ones. It doesn’t affect discoveries so you can still discover Tad but won’t see it in shop. Be careful if you’re playing demons because you won’t see rewinder so if you’re planning on using self-damage make sure you have one already.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good utility but a bit pricy at 4 gold.The earlier you get tavern 5, the more value you’re going to get, that’s where the majority of the great spells are!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Pretty bad and only worth it if you’re super behind and want to play ultra defensively.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be good if you have deflecto, otherwise only pick it if super behind and if you have a way to get some divine shields on your board.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent trinket and always a good option. Better with some tribes than others depending on what’s best in the meta.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be good if you want to force undead but that is not usually the best option
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good when playing demons, especially if you’re playing Rewinder+Malchezar
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent option when playing demons, especially since it’s so cheap!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Not terrible if you’re playing dragons but commiting to dragons from the lesser trinket turn is usually not the best option
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: One of the best lesser trinkets in terms of power, really good pick if undead are good in the meta
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: One of the best lesser trinkets in the game, insta-pick on shudderwok but definetly a consideration on any hero.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Not as good as nzoth’s hero power because it summons as 7th minion but sometimes can still be clutch
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Only pick this if you’re desperate and under pressure
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: One of the best lesser trinket picks because it’s the equivalent of one Oil every turn. Just make sure you play non-greedy and try to survive as much as possible to make the most out of it late-game.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: One of the best trinkets in the game, try to golden a Brann or Titus or jut a 6 drop and ride it to victory! Just make sure you are strong enough by playing a bit more defensive than usual after picking it to make sure you don’t die before you get it.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Generally not a great pick, even if you want to play boars.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good pick if you want to play boars and you have a way to buff gems
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo pick, has some nice synergies with Tarecgosa or cleaves.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo but generally don’t want to build for Kabooms, use it for a power boost and then look for building something else later.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Top pick if you’re playing elementals. If you have this and Recycling Wraith you’re already on top of the world!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo and one of the best naga trinkets
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Probably the best beast lesser trinket, it can help you farm big time!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent tempo but it’s not always easy to find a target. I much preffer the greater version of this but still okay to pick it if you have the right minion to buff in your hand.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Works great with recycler, a bit risky to pick it without it
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good if you want to play boars and you have some deathrattles that summon stuff in the lobby.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo trinket, you always find a way to get good value out of it!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo trinket but a bit pricy. Still the right pick a lot of the time!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent pick if nothing better is offered, has decent synergy with Brann later in the game.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Only good if you have almost a full board of naga, which is the tribe you’d want to force afterwards if you make this pick.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good if you have a Croner already on your board or in the shop, risky pick otherwise.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo, especially when you have a ripsnarl or two.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: I’d avoid this one
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good greedy pick but you need to make sure you’re rock solid to survive until the payoff.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo pick, not only with undead even though there is where it shines!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Usually bad but can be good once in a blue moon
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be good tempo but I’d normally avoid it
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: You have some synergies with this but I normally avoid it since it’s too RNG dependant and kinda useless later
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Super crazy good with tarecgosa as your only minions into lategame scam+2 big unit composition!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good greedy pick if you can afford it. Don’t be scared that you have to pay the full price for the greater trinket, getting it one turn ahead of others is HUGE and usually worth it. Surviving until then and not taking too much damage is the hard part.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Not the most tempo but can sometimes be the right pick.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Great tempo pick ,especially with undeads or pirates!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Quite expensive for how much randomness it has, very rarely the pick.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good pick if you’re desperate for tempo or if you’re playing Poet Dragons, otherwise I’d skip.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Only worth picking if you’re already commited to undeads and you want some extra short term tempo. The downside of this trinket is that the stats are not growing over time so use it to be a bit greedy.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Very rarely the best follow up, even when you’re elementals. Decent if you have really good economy from your first trinket.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Trash
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo but not the best in end-game.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Almost never the pick, it’s just too thin in terms of power
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really bad most of the time, would onlu pick when ultra desperate and no better options are available.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good value tool, especially if you’re tavern 5 or planning to go there. It can be a sick pick when you’re not sure what you want to do.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good if you can isolate a big mech to copy, such as a reborn Automaton
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Only pick if super desperate and want to squeeze some extra tempo, really bad pick otherwise.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: In theory not bad but I couldn’t find a spot where I’d love to play this. It should be best with undeads but there you’d usually preffer to get even more attack rather than this.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Great pick, mostly because of how broken Brann is in the meta.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Probably the best undead Trinket, really good constant way to buff your minion’s attack and allows you to focus on getting synergy.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Like the lesser version of this, it’s usually not amazing(it can be!) but it’s good value and decent economy most of the time!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good if you’re already deep in the undead composition and have a bit of spell generation.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Amazing in a naga lobby if you already have buffed gems because if you hold a spellcraft until the end of the turn it’s going to count as a discard and give you the activation!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good with demon strategies if you can afford the price. Best follow-up is to go to 5 and get Urzul and Brann for some crazy plays!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be crazy with a small economy boost. You aim for Tethys+One-Amalgam generally. Ice Fisher could also work as a way to accumulate stats while cycling
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo pick, really good with Zesty Crooner to give yourself scaling.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent if you’re playing dragons but not amazing pick
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Probably the best dragon trinket, your way to win with the poet composition in the right lobby!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Only pick if desperate for stats, can have decent synergy with goldenizer or if you’re playing reno but it’s so much worse than when it was a lesser trinket.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Crazy good if you’re playing a brann composition!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Pretty bad trinket, it’s very slow and you might get useless stuff. Also very expensive cost upfront and doesn’t give you anything immediately.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent if you have great economy, kinda slow but can give you some value if the game goes long enough
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good follow up most of the time when you’re playing demons, especially when you buffed the shop. Keep in mind you’re only going to eat max 6 minions at a time so it’s best to play a non tribe. Drakkari has most synergy with this but you can also play Brann or some scam cards and not get max value from the bat every single turn since that’s easy to counter by others.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Rarely the best pick but sometimes okay tempo
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Just like it’s lesser version, can sometimes be good but keep in mind it summons as 7th minion and you can’t buff it in the shop round, making it weak to a big blaster.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Amazing with Beatboxer and Drone if you have the time to get value out of it.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Best with triggore and self damage beasts, can be decent tempo but it’s hard to win the lobby with this.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: As opposed to the lesser version, this one is actually decent tempo if you’re playing magnets or demons.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be really good when you already have stats and a way to grow them further, offering you defensiveness.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be decent if you play boars and didn’t get a better option.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Generally good when you can double it with stand and follow up with some taunt buffing strategy, generally with the help of murk eye. Otherwise it’s kinda hard to buff no tribes but it can be a sick comp if everything comes together!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Great end game trinket if you already buffed your gems a decent amount. Best with Tough Tusk because you can reset him
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: One of the best trinkets in the game, super OP with Automaton but great in other spots as well.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good tempo if you can generate enough targetable spells!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Very good when playing mechs, hard to play around and makes your taunts extra annoying. Try to not waste it on deflecto-bot though!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Pretty bad pick, it gives you some power in fights but it’s kinda flimsy, I’d avoid it.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good pick, especially if it fits your gameplan. Best with murlocs and especially if you have brann because it allows you to buff by cycling.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: I don’t really like it because it’s hard to activate. Can sometimes make sense if you’re playing with more than one Malchezar but generally I’d go for something else.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Great if you have economy and Recycler, can be a real win condition! Bonus: Nomi is awesome!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good pick overall. Can save a bad game or help you snowball a good game. Hard to go wrong with one seven drop per turn.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Good utility pick, especially when your other options are bad.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Really good to grow your gems, even better if you can play a bit around it by having some summons.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Works best as follow up to Eternal Knight Trinket, kinda average otherwise.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Amazing if you can force leapfrogger, even better if you have goldenizer or a way to make it golden!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Pretty bad usually, even with Brann.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: It’s not as good as you’d think because it doesn’t fit in the current best beast lineup which plays leapfrogger. This trinket works best with Wolf and it’s hard to get both together. Works great if you manage to do it though!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent follow-up if you’re zesty crooner but a bit light in value, only 2 spells you barely feel them. Doesn’t even work on golden lava lurker but sometimes it’s still the best option.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Decent sometimes but don’t expect too much from it, even when you play self damage beasts there are better options.
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Not the best option, even when you’re playing hand-buffing strategy but can be enough tempo sometimes
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Can be an amazing pick if you hold a big murloc, one of the best late-game trinkets since it gives you so much power during the fights!
tips.author: rdu

tips.summary: Amazing with Summon Pirates, pretty solid with undead, avoid elsewhere!
tips.author: rdu
